title: [Gameplay] arclight Vel'Koz Auto attack animation freeze
body: During a twisted treeline game, every other auto attack would cause vel'koz's animation to freeze until you attacked again. this would cause him to have no walking animiation while frozen. as the game progressed, the animation freezing became more rapid and would not unfreeze until 2 or 3 attacks were completed. the attacks would still go through, just no animation.

replies.body:
Hey cooltman,

Thanks for reporting this! We're aware of this issue and are working to resolve it! ^-^
are you guys working on Quinn's R bug too? the one where if you channel R and interrupt it yourself it will trigger sky strike half the time
This happened to me too, after I used my W auto attacked my model would freeze then my attack would bug out until I used another spell.
